name: Limited Connection
description: The pain of a limited internet connection doesn't just affect us humans. Robots know the struggle as well. Meet Clank and Beep, two robots whose only purpose is exchanging data throughout the day. Usually this means standing stationary in their containment units. Today, this means using their poorly developed rocket thrusters to attempt navigating toward each other, nevermind that the low ceilings don't treat their fragile robot heads too kindly.
